explains: adj. 未经处理的；未经治疗的

sentences.en: All the bedding is made of simple, untreated cotton.
sentences.cn: 所有的床上用品都是由未经加工的普通棉布制成的。

sentences.en: Frequently untreated human waste harvested from lavatories is delivered to farms and spread as fertilizer.
sentences.cn: 从厕所中收集的未经处理的人类排泄物往往被送到农场并作为肥料散播。

sentences.en: Pay Drechsel, an environmental scientist, argues that the social and economic benefits of using untreated human waste to grow food outweigh the health risks.
sentences.cn: 环境科学家佩·德雷塞尔认为，用未经处理的人类粪便作为种植粮食的肥料，这种做法的社会和经济效益超过了健康风险。
